languages.text: Увидев в планетарных властях не тиранов, но мудрых защитников, простолюдины избавятся от страха и сами придут на помощь стражам порядка в деле очищения мира.

Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.
languages.original_text: Увидев в планетарных властях не тиранов, но мудрых защитников, простолюдины избавятся от страха и сами придут на помощь стражам порядка в деле очищения мира.

traits.locale_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be freed from fear and instead inclined to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing the world.

Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be freed from fear and instead inclined to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing the world.

Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

languages.text: Al ver a las autoridades planetarias no como tiranos sino como sabios protectores, la gente corriente quedará libre de todo miedo y ayudará a los defensores de la ley y el orden a purificar este mundo.
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

traits.locale_text: Al ver a las autoridades planetarias no como tiranos sino como sabios protectores, la gente corriente quedará libre de todo miedo y ayudará a los defensores de la ley y el orden a purificar este mundo.

languages.text: En voyant les autorités non plus comme des tyrans, mais comme des protecteurs bienveillants, le peuple rassuré sera plus enclin à aider les gardiens de la loi, de l'ordre et de la pureté de leur monde.
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

traits.locale_text: En voyant les autorités non plus comme des tyrans, mais comme des protecteurs bienveillants, le peuple rassuré sera plus enclin à aider les gardiens de la loi, de l'ordre et de la pureté de leur monde.

languages.text: 行星的居民认识到，行星政府并非残酷的暴君，而是睿智的守护者。在此之后，他们不再担惊受怕，而是成为了法律与秩序的维护者，一同参与净化世界的伟业之中。
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

traits.locale_text: 行星的居民认识到，行星政府并非残酷的暴君，而是睿智的守护者。在此之后，他们不再担惊受怕，而是成为了法律与秩序的维护者，一同参与净化世界的伟业之中。

languages.text: 惑星当局を暴君としてではなく、聡明な守護者として見ることにより、平民は恐怖から解放され、この惑星を浄化するという大義のために法と秩序を守る人々を助けるようになった。
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

traits.locale_text: 惑星当局を暴君としてではなく、聡明な守護者として見ることにより、平民は恐怖から解放され、この惑星を浄化するという大義のために法と秩序を守る人々を助けるようになった。

languages.text: Nachdem die einfachen Bürger beginnen, die planetaren Behörden nicht als Tyrannen zu sehen, sondern als weise Beschützer, weicht ihre Angst. Sie setzen nun alles daran, den Hütern von Gesetz und Ordnung bei der Säuberung dieser Welt zu helfen.
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die einfachen Bürger beginnen, die planetaren Behörden nicht als Tyrannen zu sehen, sondern als weise Beschützer, weicht ihre Angst. Sie setzen nun alles daran, den Hütern von Gesetz und Ordnung bei der Säuberung dieser Welt zu helfen.

languages.text: Gezegen yetkililerin tiranlık değil, hamilik yaptığını gören yurttaşlar korkularını geride bırakarak dünyanın arındırılması uğruna kanun ve düzenden mesul yetkililere destek olmak maksadıyla hücum edecek.
languages.original_text: Upon seeing the planetary authorities not as tyrants, but as wise protectors, the commoners will be delivered from their fear and charge to help the keepers of law and order in their cause of cleansing this world.
